column4: Hello, I'm on the Ubuntu Shipit page. I'm confused about the CDs being offered. There's 1 Ubuntu CD (1 PC Edition), 3 Ubuntu CDs (3 PC Edition), and 3 Ubuntu CDs (2 PC Edition). Whats the difference between these?
pc - 32bit, so 1 pc, 3 pc, or 2pc+1 64 bit
yes to give to your friends :)
Oh great! I have friends who I want to switch to Linux :D
